content: Turn and face away from the altar. There are two places you'll want to go here to get collectibles. First, head to the stairs, but take the small path down to the right. Follow this to find a golden turtle, where you can get the Slumbering Beetle Husk.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
Turn and face away from the altar. There are two places you'll want to go here to get collectibles. First, head to the stairs, but take the small path down to the right. Follow this to find a golden turtle, where you can get the Slumbering Beetle Husk.
